Panel._TransparencyComments: Set these to configure transparency enable/state
Panel._HiddenComment: Set this to true to hide the EDD panel, and must only be used in conjunction with the ACT File indicating PopOutOnly=True

Python._VersionComment: Set Version to a value to force a particular python to be used as the interpreter (here it is Disabled)
Python._ModulesCheckComment: Set this variable below to run a python program which imports all the modules your app needs
Python._ModulesComment: Set this array below to the list of modules that EDD installs if checkmodules.py fails
Python._StartComment: Set this to the starting python file
Python._CreateNoWindowComment: Set to try to prevent the console window for the python instance to be created, false for debugging. Default is false
